channel.title: [317] Firemaking
channel.description:
Hi.
So, I managed to get a nice firemaking base going for my server, and it works very well. Working walk-back, etc. But there's just two problems I have with it, and I don't know how to fix them. Plx help me. ;d
1) When the character does the walk-back after lighting the logs, he can go through object's/wall's if he comes to any, how can I prevent that? (Like the command noclip).
2) How do I make the fire's disappear after a certain time?
Any help or attempt to help is highly appreciated, please no flaming me. I've just so recently been getting back into coding. :) Thanks mopar.

item.title: [317] Firemaking
item.dc:creator: @ohokay ohokay
item.description:
@ohokay wrote:

#2

There should be a parameter in one of your object spawning methods which allows an object to be spawned for a number of ticks. This is what you need.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Firemaking
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

MyNameIsDylan:

Links broke.

Like I said.
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,527173.msg4393705.html#msg4393705

item.title: [317] Firemaking
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

For #1, you’re going to need to add some form of a server-sided clipping system. Whether it be region clipping, or tile, does not matter. Then from there you can check if the walking area is okay and so on.
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=527173.0 < There’s a region clipping system.
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,527173.msg4393705.html#msg4393705 <Dl link I posted for it.

There are a couple tutorials out there that use this exact system for the walking.
You may want to search around for some.

Read full topic
